data.title: Valve Corporation Company Profile: Financials, Valuation, and Growth
data.meta_description: Valve Corporation is a privately-held entertainment software and technology company. The platform offers a wide range of games to a community of players, as well as enables users to buy, play, share, modify and build communities around Valve products. In addition, the company offers animation and modeling, audio production, design and illustration, game development, video production, and hardware products, etc. Valve Corporation was founded in 1996 by Gabe Newell and Mike Harrington. Valve Corporation headquarters are located in Bellevue, Washington.
